targets.expr: label_replace(label_replace(group by (target_kind, target_name)(kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="StatefulSet", name="$name"}>0), "name", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)"), "kind", "$1", "target_kind", "(.*)") * on(name, kind)  group_right() ceil(sum(increase(eventer_events_error_total{namespace='$namespace'}[1h])) by (kind, name, reason)) > 0

group by (service) (label_replace(group by (name) (label_replace(group by(target_name) (kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="StatefulSet", name="$name", target_kind="Pod"}>0), "name", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)") * on(target_name) group_right() kube_resource_relationship{kind="Endpoints", target_kind="Pod"}>0), "service", "$1", "name", "(.*)")) * on(service) group_right() group by (cluster_ip, uid, service) (kube_service_info{namespace="$namespace"})

group by (persistentvolumeclaim, storageclass, node, volumename) (group by (persistentvolumeclaim) (label_replace(group by (target_name) (kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="StatefulSet", name="$name", target_kind="PersistentVolumeClaim"}>0), "persistentvolumeclaim", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)")) * on (persistentvolumeclaim) group_right() kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}) * on (persistentvolumeclaim) group_left() kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{phase="Bound", namespace="$namespace"}

panels.description: 展示该工作负载的每个 Pod 内存使用量。

targets.expr:
avg(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod, image) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"}))by (container, pod, image)

max(avg(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod, image) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}))by (container, pod))by(container)

max(avg(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}))by (container, pod))by(container)

panels.title: Memory Usage

targets.expr:
sum(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

sum(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

panels.description: 展示该工作负载每个 Pod 的 CPU 使用量。

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod, container,image)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod, container,image)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod, container,image)

panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr:
sum(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

panels.description: 用户级 CPU 使用率相对于整体 CPU 使用量的比例。

targets.expr:
avg(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() (max(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!=""}[5m])) by (pod, container,image) / max(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!=""}[5m])+rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container,image))) by (pod,container,image)

panels.title: CPU User Time(%)

panels.description: The number of network errors including receiving and transmitting.

targets.expr:
sum(sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() (sum(container_network_receive_errors_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) + sum(container_network_transmit_errors_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)))

panels.title: Network Errors

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)
